name: places/ChIJfUXTT6tZwokR2l1NreecXuM
formattedAddress: 206 W 41st St, New York, NY 10036, USA
adrFormatAddress: 206 W 41st St, New York, NY 10036, USA

editorialSummary.text: Cozy, Broadway-themed rooms & suites in a hip hotel with a diner-style restaurant/bar & free Wi-Fi.

originalText.text: Stayed at this hotel during our trip to New York in July 2023. It was expensive but it was expected as it is on Times Square. The location was perfect and easy to get to subway stations. It was easy to remember the location as well which was perfect for us as it was our first time in New York. Hotel name on the building is big and lit up, so it is not hard to miss it. Our room was quite small but it was all we needed as we were out and about each day. The room was super clean and the room was cleaned each day of our stay. Towels were changed out as needed. The only thing is that we did not have much a view of times square. The window in our room was just a view of a wall but not a big deal as I believe it is a smaller hotel business. We slept good and had no issues with it being loud. We didn't notice anything and had no issues sleeping. As for the employees at the hotel, they were all super friendly and nice. They made check in and check out fast and easy. Made sure to greet us each time they saw us and also let us know when they would lock the doors during night hours. This was great as it made me feel safe staying here knowing that they lock their lobby doors during certain hours. They were also able to hold our luggage and bags for us, free of charge-when we arrived too early to check in and when we were waiting to head to the airport on our last day.

originalText.text: Traveling alone can be very intimidating, especially to NYC, but this hotel definitely made the process much easier! The room was clean, organized, and QUIET throughout my stay, and although it was a little on the smaller side, the location in proximity to times Square and Broadway shows made up for it!! The front desk staff were very pleasant and helpful throughout my stay as well, and were able to offer dining suggestions and help with directions. Overall I felt the value for my money here has exceeded my expectations in every way, and as a single traveller, this place truly felt like a home away from home. Will definitely be returning again soon!

Will definitely be returning again soon!

originalText.text: Stay away from this hotel. You will not get sleep or feel relaxed. Do not stay on the 2nd floor. You will hear music until 4am. Very very small rooms. I asked to be moved to another room and they couldn't move me when they had rooms available online. I wouldn't ever stay here again.

text.text: Stay away from this hotel. You will not get sleep or feel relaxed. Do not stay on the 2nd floor. You will hear music until 4am. Very very small rooms. I asked to be moved to another room and they couldn't move me when they had rooms available online. I wouldn't ever stay here again.

originalText.text: First and foremost I would like to say do not book through third party for this hotel. If you do make sure you add on about $200 to whatever total they told you because they have to hold $100 and then the other $100 is taxes that they said aren’t accounted for on the third party site. If I would’ve known all of this I would’ve booked a different hotel because after all the charges, it wasn’t worth it. The room is where my problem actually is. You should either go alone or go with someone you are VERY COMFORTABLE with. The size of the room is the tiniest I’ve ever been in. You take one step and you and your partner are on top of each other. The bed was the worst I’ve ever been on. I’m not sure if the person before us broke it or it’s normally that bumby. It had so many lumps and bumbs that it was slanting and I would roll to my partners side. The view is a brick wall and I could never tell if it was morning or night cause it was always dark. The storage is nice but I think if the pictures gave a realistic view I would’ve went elsewhere. The front desk people were nice and the convenience of location was great. If you find cheaper then go but if not then you can still go here as long as it’s a short trip. Lastly, my confirmation said checkout was at 12 yet the door locked us out at 11. Called the front frint desk because our bags were still in the room and the front desk said checkout was 11 not 12. Everything posted online was wrong basically.

originalText.text: The room was clean and the bed was good. But it was impossible to sleep there. All ACs in this hotel are old. Even if you turn it off it won't help you because some of your neighbors will turn on theirs.
